data.title: Germany
meta_keywords: We're a company of pioneers. It's our job to make bold bets
and we get our energy from inventing on behalf of customers. Success is measured against the possible
not the probable. For today’s pioneers
that’s exactly why there’s no place on Earth they’d rather build than Amazon.
data.meta_description:
Germany










The Magic of Berlin & Munich


Berlin is the capital city and one of the 16 states of Germany. Home to renowned universities, research institutes, orchestras, museums and celebrities, as well as host of sporting events, it’s a world centre for culture, politics, media and science too. Not surprisingly, Berlin is also a popular tourist destination. And its urban settings and historical legacy boost its appeal for international film productions as well. Here you can make the most of a wealth of diverse festivals, architecture, nightlife and contemporary arts, along with strong transport networks and a high quality of living.

Munich is the capital and the largest city of the German state of Bavaria. It lies on the River Isar north of the Bavarian Alps. Modern Munich is a financial and publishing hub, and frequently ranks among the top destinations for expatriate migration. Indeed it has the strongest economy of any German city and hosts the headquarters of many well-known companies.

Checkout our open roles below and apply to join our team in Germany today!







 

Apply Now

 












Join Us!


Help us define and build the best experience for our worldwide customers.

To realize the needs of our diverse customers and businesses, we need a diverse team of talented, innovative and unique builders. If this sounds like you, we want to learn more about you!








The Teams

Offices

Accepting an Offer














Teams in Berlin ▼













Shopping Foundations Organization ▼


We ownn identifying applications efficiency opportunities across the whole Amazon online store stack. From then, we closely work with teams to drive or own the optimization end-to-end, from design to development and make sure it reaches our end-customers in a timely manner. They also own the systems that tie together these different kinds of contributions to our store, including technologies for profile management, gamification, content understanding, moderation and abuse.












Deals ▼


Our team is an integral part of the Amazon shopping experience. We are driving the most important events of the year, like Prime Day and Black Friday, generating a multi-billion dollar business. Our features are used by hundreds of millions of customers world-wide. We partner with teams throughout the Amazon ecosystem to optimize deal ingestion, classification and ranking of deals, deal discovery throughout the website, and to raise the bar for the best customer experience on mobile app, web, desktop.












Reviews ▼


We lead Amazon reviews world-wide, is growing fast. We are responsible for many iconic Amazon experiences including Customer Reviews, Question and Answers, including submitting text and video reviews as well as the back end infrastructure of Reviews. We meet customers at their channel of preference with the most relevant content at the right time and frequency. We directly create and operate marketing campaigns, and we have also enabled select partner teams to build programs by reusing and extending OM’s infrastructure.












Outbound Automation Tech (OAT) ▼


Join us and build the future of automated, personalized outbound marketing at Amazon! Our team is responsible for delighting our customers with timely, relevant notifications (email, mobile, and voice) to drive awareness and discovery of Amazon’s products and services. We meet customers at their channel of preference with the most relevant content at the right time and frequency. We directly create and operate notification strategies, and we have also enabled select partner teams to build programs by reusing and extending OAT’s infrastructure.












Buying Experience ▼


Our mission is to create the most-loved shopping experience for everyone in the world. We are the worldwide product showroom for "the everything store" which Millions of customers around the world shop on Amazon from every device imaginable. We aim to be the world’s first and most trusted choice for every customer on earth to discover, evaluate, and purchase any product or service and love their individual buying experience.












Gifting ▼


We build the experiences to connect gift givers and gift recipients. We start by providing services like Gift Finder to help people find the perfect gift to send for a given holiday. Then we enrich the gift giving experience through custom gift messages, gift wrap options, and gift receipts for easier returns. Our newest product offering allows the option to "Let the recipient provide their own address" so customers can send a gift to a friend or coworker who they don't know the address of. Combined, these products and services form Amazon's multi-billion dollar Gifting business, serving hundreds of millions of customers shopping for gifts.












People eXperience Foundation (PXF)▼


We are the PXF organization, responsible for building the employee experiences and distribute web services that support Amazon employees every day by teaching and reinforcing our unique Day 1 culture. We do this through technology solutions powered by data, machine learning, and smart automation, that help Amazonians to take actions, guide them through processes, and enable them to self-serve, so that they spend less time in product and more time delivering for customers. We provide the one-stop experience that Amazonians use daily to manage their employment, grow their career, manage their teams and remain connected to life at Amazon. At PXF we serve Amazonians through a human-centred design approach to technology innovations, with the goal of supporting Amazon’s mission to become Earth’s best employer.












Amazon Search▼


If you have searched for an item to buy on Amazon, you have used our search services. We are a team responsible for the search and discovery experience for our customers worldwide. In the background, we index our worldwide catalog of products, deploy highly scalable AWS fleets, and use advanced machine learning to match relevant and interesting products to every customer's query. We provide information, answer questions, and make recommendations to help customers find what they're looking for, and utilize deep learning-based computer vision solutions, like the Amazon App camera search, so customers can easily and quickly search the world around them. We build augmented reality technology, like Amazon’s AR View feature, so customers can envision products they want to buy within their home. We build on Amazon’s personalization technology to help customers discover what they need and want.

Our search customer experience is made possible by an innovative team of engineers, research and applied scientists, product and program managers, designers, and economists in Seattle and in Amazon offices around the world.

Together, we are building the best way for our customers to shop - if you are looking to build products that delight customers and you enjoy scientific, and technical challenges, check out the job listings below. We would love to hear from you.












International Technology (INTech)▼


We are the INTech family. Great to meet you! We own the discovery and delivery of Amazon’s engineering to all the customers and cultures of the world. We do this through a combination of innovative new projects and partnerships with other Amazon technical teams. We make sure that each of our websites is a thoughtful combination of best practices and unique last mile engineering driven by each country’s customers’ needs. Our technology stack span from front-end customer experience to back-end service technology driving the implementation and adoption of high impact solutions.

At INTech, we build systems to allow our customers to purchase items that require an extra set of verification, for example from government bodies including pet prescription food and aged verification products. Our systems collect information that are legally verified before the final product is shipped to the customers. We have multiple sets of customers, the end consumers and the third party sellers, and we own the entire software life-cycle of a shopping experience from the beginning of the customer journey all the way to the end. The multiyear vision is to build the foundation of new business lines across the EU, progressively expanding to new markets.

Our main used programming language is Java but when needed we switched to different languages for particular projects or problems to be solved on a AWS native environment. Among other things we work on optical recognition and ML capabilities like all Amazon teams, we Work Hard, Have Fun and Make History. And... we are passionate about our people, from ensuring our teams are safe and well to dedicated focus on career and skill development, our priority is our people.














Teams in Munich ▼












Amazon Selection and Catalog Systems (ASCS)▼


Powering the online buying experience for global customers, we build the systems that host and run the world’s largest e-Commerce products catalogue. We power the online buying experience for worldwide customers, allowing them to find, discover and buy anything they want. Our massively scaled out systems process hundreds of millions of updates on billions of products across physical, digital, and service offerings.

At ASCS we are the AWS for eCommerce, providing building blocks to assemble to deliver reliable and accurate product information for customers. ASCS is at the edge of capabilities for many AWS services driving innovation across Amazon operating on the largest product catalog in the world. Some of our services are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the AWS services which we run them on.

We continuously stretch the limits of distributed systems and big data processing to solve some of the hardest technical problems and unprecedented scale challenges. Our team develops technologies spanning parallel processing, storage, machine learning, natural language processing, and image recognition to overcome these challenges.

Our customers are both sellers and buyers by increasing the breadth of selection, and the quality of data on that selection, we improve the customer experience. This improved customer experience encourages more customers to the site which increases traffic, as traffic increases more sellers are attracted to the site to sell their products, which in turn helps us to increase our selection. Economies of scale then allows for lowering our cost structure and therefore lowering prices to further increase customer experience.
















   
 

Some things you will find in our Germany Tech Hubs


Berlin
 


	Business Service Center (Mailroom): Employees can receive their parcels and documentation here.
	Mother's Rooms: The room is furnished with an ergo chair, a refrigerator and an "Occupied/Free" sign.
	Quiet Rooms: There you will find a sofa and blanket. The room can be used by any Amazonian that would like to have a quiet moment to themselves, such as for a prayer or even a nap. It's just a nice place to escape when needed.
	Wellness Room: This room can be used for activities such as yoga. There you will find yoga mats available for use.
	Game Area: Game areas can be found on several floors throughout the building. There you will find X-Box or PlayStation, Kicker table, Ping Pong table, Basketball court.
	Roof deck / Terrace: On the top floor of the building, you will find a rooftop terrace. There you have the option to catch fresh air, eat lunch or host a small meeting, all while having a great view of Berlin.

 

Munich
 


	Mother's Rooms: Our mother’s room is equipped with a comfortable chair, milk fridge, lockers and large windows for natural day light. For your privacy, the mother’s room is equipped with an occupied sign on the door.
	Quiet Zones: Quiet zones and Focus rooms are available on each floor.
	Personal lockers: Available for all Amazonians.
	Wellness Room: Iur Expert Massage Therapist, will offer professional massage services every Thursday.
	Multi Faith Room: You can use this room for your morning meditation, relaxing, praying or simply re-charging on busy days.
















Benefits

Amazon provides a full range of benefits for our global employees and their eligible family members. Below you will find a list of the benefits offered to you when you join the company in Germany.

A further breakdown of each individual benefit can be provided to you by your recruitment or HR contact, either during your interview process or before you start. This is an overview of the range of employee benefits offered by Amazon

Benefits offered at Amazon, Germany:



	Amazon Discount Code
	Life insurance and long-term disability benefit
	International Business Travel
	Employee Assistance Program
	Restricted Stock Units (RSU’s)
	Social security benefits
	Commuting benefit


 













Affinity Groups


Employee resource groups bring Amazonians together across our many different businesses and locations around the world, to drive inclusion and a sense of belonging. Affinity groups play an important role in building internal networks for creating a community, advising Amazon business units, leading in service projects, and reaching out to communities where Amazonians live and work.

Find out more about  Affinity Groups.
